description: Animals, pets, farm animals, and animal-related vocabulary

sentences.explanation: 'Un chat' = a cat (masculine). 'Une chatte' = female cat.
'Le chien' = dog (masculine). 'Aboyer' = to bark. 'Fort' = loudly.
'Les oiseaux' = birds (masculine plural). 'Voler' = to fly.
'La vache' = cow (feminine). 'Du lait' = milk (partitive article).
'Les poissons' = fish (plural). 'Nager' = to swim. 'Dans l'eau' = in water.
'Mon lapin' = my rabbit (masculine). 'Des carottes' = carrots (plural).
'Le cheval' = horse (masculine). 'Courir' = to run (irregular). 'Vite' = fast.
'Les lions' = lions (plural). 'Vivre' = to live. 'En Afrique' = in Africa.

sentences.english: The cat sleeps on the sofa.
sentences.explanation: 'Dormir' = to sleep (irregular). 'Sur le canapé' = on the sofa.
'Les éléphants' = elephants (plural). 'Très gros' = very big. Size description.

sentences.english: I feed my goldfish every day.
sentences.explanation: 'Nourrir' = to feed. 'Poisson rouge' = goldfish. 'Tous les jours' = every day.
'Les moutons' = sheep (plural). 'De la laine blanche' = white wool.
'Les abeilles' = bees (feminine plural). 'Faire du miel' = to make honey.
'Le tigre' = tiger (masculine). 'Des rayures' = stripes (feminine plural).
'Les singes' = monkeys (plural). 'Grimper aux arbres' = climb trees.

sentences.english: My hamster runs in its wheel.
sentences.explanation: 'Mon hamster' = my hamster (masculine). 'Sa roue' = its wheel (feminine).
'Les poules' = hens/chickens (feminine). 'Pondre' = to lay (eggs).
'Le papillon' = butterfly (masculine). 'Coloré' = colorful (masculine).
'Les dauphins' = dolphins (plural). 'Des animaux intelligents' = intelligent animals.
'Le vétérinaire' = veterinarian. 'Les animaux malades' = sick animals.
'Remuer' = to wag/move. 'La queue' = tail (feminine).
'Aimer' + infinitive = to like to do. 'Grimper' = to climb.
'Sauter' = to hop/jump. 'Rapidement' = quickly.
'Vivre dans' = to live in. 'L'aquarium' = aquarium (masculine).
'Le cochon' = pig (masculine). 'Sale' = dirty.
'Chanter' = to sing. 'Le matin' = in the morning.

sentences.english: The snake is long and thin.
sentences.explanation: 'Le serpent' = snake. 'Long et mince' = long and thin.

sentences.english: I walk my dog every day.
sentences.explanation: 'Promener' = to walk (a pet). 'Tous les jours' = every day.
'L'ours' = bear (masculine). 'Fort' = strong.
'Les grenouilles' = frogs (feminine). 'La mare' = pond.
'La tortue' = turtle (feminine). 'Lente' = slow (feminine).
'Donner' = to give. 'De la laine' = wool (partitive article).
'Le loup' = wolf. 'Hurler' = to howl. 'La nuit' = at night.
'Mon perroquet' = my parrot (masculine). 'Parler' = to talk.
'Les souris' = mice (feminine). 'De petits animaux' = small animals.
'Le zoo' = zoo. 'Beaucoup d'animaux' = many animals.
'Les canards' = ducks (masculine). 'Sur le lac' = on the lake.

sentences.english: The giraffe has a long neck.
sentences.explanation: 'La girafe' = giraffe (feminine). 'Un long cou' = a long neck.
'Chasser' = to hunt. Natural animal behavior.
'Le coq' = rooster. 'Chanter' = to crow. 'À l'aube' = at dawn.
'Les araignées' = spiders (feminine). 'Faire des toiles' = to make webs.
'Toute la journée' = all day. 'Dormir' = to sleep (irregular).
'Fidèles' = loyal (plural). Describing animal personality traits.
'Le kangourou' = kangaroo. 'Sauter haut' = to jump high.
'Les fourmis' = ants (feminine). 'Ensemble' = together.
'Le hibou' = owl. 'Voler la nuit' = to fly at night.
'Les manchots' = penguins. 'En Antarctique' = in Antarctica.
'Poursuivre' = to chase. 'La balle' = ball (feminine).
'Colorés' = colorful (masculine plural). Butterfly description.
'Connaître' = to know. 'Des tours' = tricks (masculine).
'Manger de l'herbe' = to eat grass. Farm animal diet.
'Lécher' = to lick. 'Ses poils' = its fur (plural).
'Rusés' = clever/cunning (masculine plural). Fox characteristics.
'Le paon' = peacock. 'De belles plumes' = beautiful feathers.
'De longues oreilles' = long ears. Physical characteristics.
'Courir en rond' = to run in circles. Pet behavior.

sentences.english: Wild animals live in the forest.
sentences.explanation: 'Les animaux sauvages' = wild animals. 'Dans la forêt' = in the forest.
'Ronronner' = to purr. 'Quand il est content' = when (he is) happy.
'Galoper' = to gallop. 'Dans le champ' = in the field.

sentences.english: I give water to my bird.
sentences.explanation: 'Donner à' = to give to. 'De l'eau' = water (partitive).
'La baleine' = whale (feminine). 'Énorme' = enormous.
'Ramasser' = to collect/gather. 'Des noix' = nuts.
'Aboyer sur' = to bark at. Protection behavior.
'Avoir besoin de' = to need. 'Eau propre' = clean water.
'Rugir' = to roar. 'Fort' = loudly/strongly.

sentences.english: Cats see well in the dark.
sentences.explanation: 'Voir bien' = to see well. 'Dans le noir' = in the dark.
'La chèvre' = goat (feminine). 'Escalader' = to climb.

sentences.english: Bees fly from flower to flower.
sentences.explanation: 'De fleur en fleur' = from flower to flower. Bee behavior.

sentences.english: The cat hides under the bed.
sentences.explanation: 'Se cacher' = to hide (reflexive). 'Sous le lit' = under the bed.
'Chasser en meute' = to hunt in packs. Wolf behavior.
'Manger de la salade' = to eat lettuce/salad. Rabbit diet.
'Attraper' = to catch. 'Des mouches' = flies.
'Suivre' = to follow. 'Son maître' = its owner (masculine).
'Les chameaux' = camels. 'Dans le désert' = in the desert.
'S'étirer' = to stretch. 'Après avoir dormi' = after sleeping.
'Construire' = to build. 'Des nids' = nests.
'Porter un collier' = to wear a collar. Pet accessories.
'Les phoques' = seals. 'Dans l'océan' = in the ocean.

sentences.english: The cat plays with a ball of yarn.
sentences.explanation: 'Jouer avec' = to play with. 'Une pelote de laine' = ball of yarn.
'Nocturnes' = nocturnal. 'Des oiseaux nocturnes' = nocturnal birds.

sentences.english: The horse neighs in the stable.
sentences.explanation: 'Hennir' = to neigh. 'L'écurie' = stable (feminine).
'Se chauffer au soleil' = to sunbathe. Reptile behavior.
'Obéissant' = obedient (masculine). Pet personality trait.
'Bouger' = to move. 'Très lentement' = very slowly.
'Répéter' = to repeat. 'Des mots' = words.
'À travers' = through. 'Les cerfs' = deer (masculine plural).
'Miauler' = to meow. 'Pour avoir à manger' = for food.
'Une excellente mémoire' = excellent memory. Elephant trait.
'Le cochon d'Inde' = guinea pig. 'Couiner' = to squeak.
'Hiberner' = to hibernate. 'En hiver' = in winter.

sentences.english: The cat sits by the window.
sentences.explanation: 'S'asseoir' = to sit down. 'Près de' = near/by.
'Des mammifères intelligents' = intelligent mammals. Animal classification.

sentences.english: The dog digs holes in the garden.
sentences.explanation: 'Creuser' = to dig. 'Des trous' = holes.
'Indépendants' = independent (masculine plural). Cat personality.

sentences.english: The butterfly lands on the flower.
sentences.explanation: 'Se poser sur' = to land on. Butterfly behavior.
'Animal de compagnie' = pet. 'Avoir besoin d'exercice' = to need exercise.

sentences.english: The shark swims in deep water.
sentences.explanation: 'Le requin' = shark. 'L'eau profonde' = deep water.
'Du foin et de l'avoine' = hay and oats. Horse diet.
'Faire ses griffes' = to sharpen claws (idiomatic). Cat behavior.
'Migrer' = to migrate. 'En automne' = in autumn.
'Le chaton' = kitten (masculine). 'Très mignon' = very cute.
'Les chiots' = puppies. 'Adorer' = to love/adore.
'Changer de couleur' = to change colors. 'Le lézard' = lizard.
'Cancaner' = to quack. 'Bruyamment' = loudly/noisily.
'Les flamants' = flamingos. 'Des oiseaux roses' = pink birds.
'Boire' = to drink (irregular). 'Du lait' = milk (partitive).
'Quatre pattes' = four legs/paws. 'Les pattes' = animal legs.
'Des plumes colorées' = colorful feathers. 'Colorées' (feminine plural).
'Protéger' = to protect. Guard dog behavior.

sentences.english: Zebras have black and white stripes.
sentences.explanation: 'Des rayures noires et blanches' = black and white stripes.
'Le poisson rouge' = goldfish. 'Nager en rond' = to swim in circles.

sentences.english: The cow moos in the field.
sentences.explanation: 'Meugler' = to moo. 'Dans le pré' = in the meadow/field.
'Amical' = friendly (masculine). Dog personality trait.

sentences.english: The hen sits on her eggs.
sentences.explanation: 'Couver' = to brood/sit on eggs. 'Ses œufs' = her eggs.
'Les crocodiles' = crocodiles. 'Dans les rivières' = in rivers.
'Grimper à' = to climb (up). 'L'arbre' = tree (masculine).
'Les furets' = ferrets. 'Joueurs' = playful (masculine plural).
'Avoir besoin d'eau fraîche' = to need fresh water.
'Le nectar des fleurs' = flower nectar. Butterfly feeding.

sentences.english: The dog sits when I say 'sit'.
sentences.explanation: 'S'asseoir' = to sit down. 'Quand je dis' = when I say.
